languages.text: Сквозь витражи капитанского мостика Ирлиэт наблюдает, как крохотное судно скрывается за одним из миров системы. Сколь же жестоки мон-кай. Обладая властью над чужими судьбами, они легко даруют надежду на спасение... А затем в одночасье отнимают ее, бросая страждущих на произвол судьбы.

Yrliet watches through the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge as the minuscule vessel hides behind one of the system's worlds. How cruel the mon-keigh are. Having power over the destinies of others, they readily give hope for salvation one moment... and then take it away the next, leaving the suffering to their fate.
languages.original_text: Сквозь витражи капитанского мостика Ирлиэт наблюдает, как крохотное судно скрывается за одним из миров системы. Сколь же жестоки мон-кай. Обладая властью над чужими судьбами, они легко даруют надежду на спасение... А затем в одночасье отнимают ее, бросая страждущих на произвол судьбы.

Having power over the destinies of others, they readily give hope for salvation one moment... And they take it away the next, leaving the suffering to their fate.

Having power over the destinies of others, they readily give hope for salvation one moment... And they take it away the next, leaving the suffering to their fate.

Having power over the destinies of others, they readily give hope for salvation one moment... and then take it away the next, leaving the suffering to their fate.

Having power over the destinies of others, they readily give hope for salvation one moment... and then take it away the next, leaving the suffering to their fate.

Yrliet watches through the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge as the minuscule vessel hides behind one of the system's worlds. How cruel the mon-keigh are. Having power over the destinies of others, they readily give hope for salvation one moment... and then take it away the next, leaving the suffering to their fate.

languages.text: 伊莉耶特透过舰桥的彩色玻璃窗，眼睁睁地看着这艘渺小的舰船消失在星系的某个世界后面。这些猴子是多么残忍，他们拥有肆意掌控他人命运的力量。他们带来了救赎的希望……随后又漫不经心地将它肆意夺走，让那些痛苦之人任由命运摆布。
languages.original_text: Yrliet watches through the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge as the minuscule vessel hides behind one of the system's worlds. How cruel the mon-keigh are. Having power over the destinies of others, they readily give hope for salvation one moment... and then take it away the next, leaving the suffering to their fate.

traits.locale_text: 伊莉耶特透过舰桥的彩色玻璃窗，眼睁睁地看着这艘渺小的舰船消失在星系的某个世界后面。这些猴子是多么残忍，他们拥有肆意掌控他人命运的力量。他们带来了救赎的希望……随后又漫不经心地将它肆意夺走，让那些痛苦之人任由命运摆布。

languages.text: ユリエットは船長のブリッジのステンドグラスの窓から、極小の船が星系の惑星のひとつの向こうに隠れるのを眺めていた。モン＝ケイは、なんと無慈悲なことか。他人の運命を支配する力を持つ彼らは、ある瞬間、容易に救いの希望を与え…そして次の瞬間にはそれを奪い去り、苦しみの運命に突き落とす。
languages.original_text: Yrliet watches through the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge as the minuscule vessel hides behind one of the system's worlds. How cruel the mon-keigh are. Having power over the destinies of others, they readily give hope for salvation one moment... and then take it away the next, leaving the suffering to their fate.

traits.locale_text: ユリエットは船長のブリッジのステンドグラスの窓から、極小の船が星系の惑星のひとつの向こうに隠れるのを眺めていた。モン＝ケイは、なんと無慈悲なことか。他人の運命を支配する力を持つ彼らは、ある瞬間、容易に救いの希望を与え…そして次の瞬間にはそれを奪い去り、苦しみの運命に突き落とす。

languages.text: Yrliet observa a través de las vidrieras del puente del capitán cómo la minúscula nave se oculta tras uno de los mundos del sistema. Qué crueles son los mon-keigh. Con el poder que tienen sobre el destino de los demás, en un momento dan esperanzas de salvación... y en otro las quitan, abandonando a los que sufren a su suerte.
languages.original_text: Yrliet watches through the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge as the minuscule vessel hides behind one of the system's worlds. How cruel the mon-keigh are. Having power over the destinies of others, they readily give hope for salvation one moment... and then take it away the next, leaving the suffering to their fate.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet observa a través de las vidrieras del puente del capitán cómo la minúscula nave se oculta tras uno de los mundos del sistema. Qué crueles son los mon-keigh. Con el poder que tienen sobre el destino de los demás, en un momento dan esperanzas de salvación... y en otro las quitan, abandonando a los que sufren a su suerte.

languages.text: Yrliet sieht durch das Buntglasfenster der Brücke zu, wie sich das winzige Schiff hinter einer der Welten des Systems verbirgt. Wie grausam die Chem-Pan-Sey sind. Wenn sie Macht über das Schicksal anderer besitzen, schenken sie ihnen Hoffnung ... nur um sie nächsten Moment wieder zu zerstören und die Notleidenden ihrem Schicksal überlassen.
languages.original_text: Yrliet watches through the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge as the minuscule vessel hides behind one of the system's worlds. How cruel the mon-keigh are. Having power over the destinies of others, they readily give hope for salvation one moment... and then take it away the next, leaving the suffering to their fate.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet sieht durch das Buntglasfenster der Brücke zu, wie sich das winzige Schiff hinter einer der Welten des Systems verbirgt. Wie grausam die Chem-Pan-Sey sind. Wenn sie Macht über das Schicksal anderer besitzen, schenken sie ihnen Hoffnung ... nur um sie nächsten Moment wieder zu zerstören und die Notleidenden ihrem Schicksal überlassen.

languages.text: À travers les baies vitrées de la passerelle, Yrliet regarde le minuscule vaisseau parti se cacher derrière l'un des mondes du système. Décidément, les mon-keigh sont bien cruels. Abusant de leur mainmise sur la destinée des autres races, ils prennent un malin plaisir à leur faire miroiter quelque espoir de salut... pour mieux le leur reprendre et les abandonner à leur triste sort l'instant d'après.
languages.original_text: Yrliet watches through the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge as the minuscule vessel hides behind one of the system's worlds. How cruel the mon-keigh are. Having power over the destinies of others, they readily give hope for salvation one moment... and then take it away the next, leaving the suffering to their fate.

traits.locale_text: À travers les baies vitrées de la passerelle, Yrliet regarde le minuscule vaisseau parti se cacher derrière l'un des mondes du système. Décidément, les mon-keigh sont bien cruels. Abusant de leur mainmise sur la destinée des autres races, ils prennent un malin plaisir à leur faire miroiter quelque espoir de salut... pour mieux le leur reprendre et les abandonner à leur triste sort l'instant d'après.

languages.text: Yrliet, kaptan köprüsündeki vitraylardan küçük geminin sistemdeki dünyalardan birinin ardına saklanışını izliyor. Mon-keighler ne kadar da acımasız. Başkalarının kaderi üzerinde güç sahibi olduklarında bir an için kurtuluş umudu sunuyorlar... Hemen ardından da o umudu alıp acı çekenleri kaderleriyle baş başa bırakıyorlar.
languages.original_text: Yrliet watches through the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge as the minuscule vessel hides behind one of the system's worlds. How cruel the mon-keigh are. Having power over the destinies of others, they readily give hope for salvation one moment... and then take it away the next, leaving the suffering to their fate.
